TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPackageValidationRule

summary.span: Represents a rule to applied when validating a package in a SharePoint project.

span.span: Represents a rule to applied when validating a package in a SharePoint project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此接口可定义自定义验证规则, 以帮助验证 SharePoint 项目中的包是否有效。Implement the interface to define a custom validation rule to help verify that the package in a SharePoint project is valid. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：为 SharePoint 解决方案](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-custom-feature-and-package-validation-rules-for-sharepoint-solutions)创建自定义功能和包验证规则。For more information, see [How to: Create Custom Feature and Package Validation Rules for SharePoint Solutions](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-custom-feature-and-package-validation-rules-for-sharepoint-solutions). 实现此接口的类必须包含要由项目系统发现的。Classes that implement this interface must include the to be discovered by the project system. ## Examples |日期Date|历史记录History|原因Reason| |----------|-------------|------------| |[!INCLUDE[dev10_cpub1](~/includes/dev10-cpub1-md.md)]|添加了新的备注, 其中包含指向演示如何实现此接口的主题的链接Added new remarks with links to topics that show how to implement this interface|[!INCLUDE[enhancement](~/includes/enhancement-md.md)]|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateFeature(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Validation.IPackageValidationContext context, class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectFeature feature) cil managed

param.name: context
param.span: Contextual data associated with the package and validation.

span.span: Contextual data associated with the package and validation.

param.name: feature
param.span: The feature with which to validate the package.

span.span: The feature with which to validate the package.

summary.span: Determines whether a package would violate this rule if the specified feature were added.

span.span: Determines whether a package would violate this rule if the specified feature were added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此规则仅适用于包中的项目项, 则此方法不执行任何操作。If this rule applies only to project items in a package, then this method does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidatePackage(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Validation.IPackageValidationContext context) cil managed

param.name: context
param.span: Contextual data associated with the package and validation.

span.span: Contextual data associated with the package and validation.

summary.span: Determines whether a package currently violates this rule.

span.span: Determines whether a package currently violates this rule.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateProjectItem(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Validation.IPackageValidationContext context, class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem projectItem) cil managed

param.name: context
param.span: Contextual data associated with the package and validation.

span.span: Contextual data associated with the package and validation.

param.name: projectItem
param.span: The project item with which to validate the package.

span.span: The project item with which to validate the package.

summary.span: Determines whether a package would violate this rule if the specified project item is added.

span.span: Determines whether a package would violate this rule if the specified project item is added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此规则仅适用于包中的功能, 则此方法不执行任何操作。If this rule applies only to features in a package, then this method does nothing.
